EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge Society – IGNITE! – 30 November
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SO, YOU’VE JUST FINISHED NCS WITH THE CHALLENGE. WHAT’S NEXT? On 30 November The Challenge Society is bringing you Ignite! – an exciting opportunity to reunite with your friends from the summer and find out where the skills you gained on the programme can take you next.
You could be taking part in loads of different interactive workshops or hearing the latest from industry professionals.
What you will get is the chance to hear about what it takes to succeed from the experts and make your voice heard on the issues that matter to you. THERE ARE LIMITED SPACES AT THIS EXCLUSIVE EVENT SO MAKE SURE YOU DON’T MISS OUT! Just go to www.tcsignite.eventbrite.co.uk and select your local event to let us know you’re coming.
Why not spread the word and get your team from the summer involved? Any questions, just let us know at ignite@the-challenge.org or call us on 07939 581 556
See you there!
